features: Ideal body cleaning set: Indulge in a luxurious bathing experience with our ultra-soft bath sponge. Its plush texture gently exfoliates and massages your skin, leaving it feeling silky smooth and refreshed after every use.

Extra large size: Each body sponge loofah is about 75 grams and measures about 5.9 inches. The 75g puffs are larger than a standard bath ball, and its super soft and dense structure creates a richer lather for a more comfortable bath time.

Firmer and dsurable: Say goodbye to sponges that fall apart after just a few uses. Our bath sponge is designed for long-lasting durability, ensuring that you can enjoy its superior quality for many baths to come.

Nice foaming effect: Experience a rich and creamy lather with our shower puff. Its unique design allows for maximum soap retention, providing you with an abundance of suds to cleanse and pamper your skin.(Using SYHZC sponge can save you 20% of the shower gel)

Multiple colors: Add a pop of color to your bath time routine with our vibrant loofah sponge. Available in a variety of eye-catching colors, it's not only a practical addition to your bathroom but a stylish one as well.
description: From the brand Previous page At SYHZC, we're on a quest to make every day better. We focus on bathroom production such as cleaning tools, and so on. For the past years, we've made bathroom items that delight our customers and exceed their expectations. We hope every customer could find the most suitable bathroom product from SYHZC. Bath & Body It is recommended to replace each sponge every 1-2 months. Next page
